summary: In 1845 Texas, a Louisiana belle is courted by a wanted Spanish nobleman and a Texas brawling gunrunner but her suitors' passionate duel is interrupted by the cavalry and a Comanche attack.
cast: Dean Martin|Alain Delon|Rosemary Forsyth|Joey Bishop|Tina Aumont|Peter Graves|Michael Ansara|Linden Chiles|Andrew Prine|Stuart Anderson|Roy Barcroft|George Wallace|Don Beddoe|Kelly Thordsen|Nora Marlowe|John Harmon|Richard Farnsworth|Jimmie Booth|Susan Browning|George Bruggeman|Bud Cokes|Dee Cooper|Cheryl Crawley|Tony Dante|Ken DuMain|Jaye Durkus|Bob Folkerson|Rudy Germane|Norman Grabowski|William Henry|Harry Hines|Tex Holden|Jewel Jaffe|Bobbi Jordan|Walter Kightly|Jess Kirkpatrick|John Macchia|Rod McGaughy|Joe Phillips|Noam Pitlik|Clark Ross|Danny Sands|Sammy Shore|Lincoln Tate|Jack Tornek|Arthur Tovey|Sandra Wells|Chalky Williams|Lou Wills Jr.|Henry Wills|Rita Wilson|Judith Woodbury
title: Texas
